title: 61.2 (LOA)
content:
Tollin lets out an exasperated breath as the device continues to spit out the wrong notes. A look of concern flashes across his face. "This is taking longer than I expected, although we are making steady progress. Are you sure you have time to continue helping me?"

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Help Tollin tune the lithophone. Discard all   from Tollin and go to 61.3.

B) Stop tuning the lithophone. Discard Tollin and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Return the 5 Aspect cards used to create the lithophone and each energy token above them to the collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
